Title: Makes the retail sale of new and used hybrid and certain high-efficiency vehicles exempt from state sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Makes the retail sale of new and used hybrid and certain high-efficiency vehicles exempt from state sales and compensating use taxes; grants counties and cities the option to provide such exemption; provides that such exemption shall not apply to the special tax on passenger car rentals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting the sale of hybrid vehicles and certain high-efficiency vehicles from state sales and compensating use taxes, and to authorize cities and counties to grant such exemption
